text: my name is Lama Lobsang and I belong to
the Chamberlain monastery I also run
this children's home it shouldn't be my
job to take care of these kids but I had
to do this after the 2010 usual
earthquake I took in 33 orphans after
that more and more children came now we
look after a hundred and seventy kids we
feed the children but not only that we
also care about their health and
well-being
this home from the money I make giving
religious lectures and partly from
donations from my followers and friends
from all over the country it is
expensive every year the cost of living
increases but we need more money I hope
the government can help us these kids
are the future there may be offensive
from single-parent families or from poor
families but I want to give them all a
home this is not a school or another it
is a home for these children but call me
son father and I call him my children
you
